page.title: 13Recreation - Silloth
page.content: For a small town Silloth has quite a lot of recreational clubs. The{18-hole {golf course}is said to be very testing and it actually attracts many people to Silloth. The{ bowling club }has two greens and a clubhouse called "The Bower". The England player John Bell often plays there. The {rugby club}has a clubhouse on the playing field, but its pitch is some distance away. It is very popular on Saturday nights. A new {squash court}has just been opened near the rugby club.{The football clubhouse and pitch are also there. New playing pitches are being laid out at present and then nearly all sports, including {ladies' hockey} and the {cricket club will be in one area. The exclusions are the two hard{tennis courts }at the beginning of Skinburness Road, and the {2 outdoor pools}at the caravan parks.
